name: @trz/hooks
description: 一个 React Hooks 工具集
author: ZHENYUAN <JAYNE@CHENZHENYUAN.COM>

scripts.build: npm run clean && npx tsc --outDir ./release && npm run build:babel && npm run release:cpr
scripts.release:cpr: npx cpr package.json release/ && npx cpr LICENSE release/ && npx cpr README.md release/
scripts.release:publish: npm run build && cd ./release && npm publish --access=public --registry=https://registry.npmjs.org
scripts.release:link: npm run build && cd ./release && npm link
